review: A fantastic application especially if you have Amazon Prime.  Setup is very easy and fairly intuitive with your secure wireless network.  User directions are somewhat sparse, so you need to figure it out as you go, but once set, your good to go.  Make sure your TV has an available HDMI port (not all sets do) and know how to switch from TV to Amazon Fire.  Application has Netflix built in so if you have a subscription to Netflix you can watch your favorites from this device.  Also customizes each user's preferences and streams the movies/shows without interruption.  Only had a couple of times that it needed to stop and continue loading content before continuing.
